body: It seems that issue is with https://github.com/gcc-mirror/gcc/blob/master/libgo/go/debug/elf/file.go - i dont see any PPC (non PPC_64) related code. At the same time i see some PPC code in the golang trunk - https://go.googlesource.com/go/+/master/src/debug/elf/file.go . Are you planning to add PPC code to the gccgo frontend? I will try to use this [patch](https://go.googlesource.com/go/+/5158147e24a4626d14971fdda38d71db4a975a04%5E%21/src/debug/elf/file.go) and will let you know if it works
